name: Poop Loop: Help the planet by recycling what you flush
name_original: Poop Loop: Help the planet by recycling what you flush
description:
Don't forget to full screen!

We are all part of the water cycle! 

Every day we use water and end up making it really dirty. Most people don’t think about what happens to all that water (and poop, food, etc.) when it gets flushed down a toilet or goes down a sink. In each of these three games, you will learn how wastewater (and all the stuff in it) can be recycled and reused! Play to learn how energy, water, and food for plants are created from what you flush and test out how quickly you can make these recycled resources!

In the game settings you can change the volume, difficulty, and language (English or Spanish).
